residential.headline: First home or fantastic Florey tenant for investors!!
residential.description:
Set in a quiet complex of only ten at the end of a small cul-de-sac, this delightful two bedroom townhouse is sure to please a wide range of buyers!
Stepping inside you are welcomed with a warm and inviting living and dining room that is filled with sunlight from the large window and glass sliding door.
The open plan kitchen and family room is also light and bright and opens out to the large rear courtyard through floor to ceiling glass sliding doors. The kitchen features neutral tones, electric cooking, large pantry cupboard and breakfast bar.
The two bedrooms are set at the front of the home, both a good size with built-in robes and overlook the front garden. The spacious bathroom has a bath and shower, separate w/c and open vanity area that are all in good condition plus there is also a separate laundry.
Blessed with northern orientation to both the fully enclosed front and rear courtyards, these delightful outdoor areas will be an asset come summer or winter. The front courtyard is enriched by the covered front verandah that is decorated with established vines and has been recently turfed, perfect for young children.
The generous back courtyard is sectioned into different areas by the use of paving. It is very low maintenance with only the established trees and shrubs to look after and is the ideal place to invite friends and family over for a barbeque.
Features: Small complex of ten North facing front & rear courtyards Open plan living and dining Sun-filled family room & kitchen Landscaped private front courtyard Spacious fully enclosed rear courtyard Covered front veranda Single lock up garage Perfectly positioned in cul-de-sac Boutique development of ten Walking distance to shops & Florey primary Currently tenanted to a fantastic long term tenant at $365 per week.
Living space: 93m2 plus garage and courtyards
Levies: $375.00 per quarter
Rates: $320.21 per quarter.

residential.headline: GREAT VALUE IN ISAACS!!
residential.description:
BRAND NEW CARPET AND FRESHLY PAINTED - WORK COMPLETED APRIL 7, 2015.
Just a short walk to the beautiful Isaacs Ridge reserve, this north facing three bedroom ensuite home is sure to be on the list of first home buyers, investors or those looking to down-size.
Set on one level with no stairs, the generous floor plan has an open plan living and dining room and well equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar and additional meals area.
The three bedrooms are set at the back of the home all with built-in robes and the master enjoys its own ensuite bathroom. The main bathroom boasts a shower and full size bath, as well as a separate toilet down the hall.
Outside is an enclosed backyard with an extremely low maintenance garden; complete with multiple trees to offer both shade and privacy. There is also a sunny north facing courtyard area at the front of the home.
Perfectly positioned only metres from the children's playground and a short walk to Isaacs Ridge Reserve, this home offers a low maintenance lifestyle freeing you up to enjoy the beautiful surroundings.
Features: Popular "Whispering Pines" complex North facing, free-standing townhouse Perfectly positioned near Isaacs Ridge Reserve Single level living - no stairs Three bedrooms, two bathrooms Open plan living and dining room Kitchen with meals area & breakfast bar Three bedrooms with built-in robes Master bedroom with ensuite bathroom Main bathroom with shower & bath Full sized laundry Freshly painted throughout April 2015 New carpet throughout April 2015 Complex backing children's playground Walking track to the reserve Low maintenance fully enclosed rear yard Double lock up garage
Living Area: 107 m2 approx Verandah: 10.39m2 approx Garage: 22.59m2 approx
Levies $497.25 pq Rates: $358.92 pq

residential.headline: Provisional Reserve $440,000
residential.description:
If you're a die-hard fan of TV renovation programs and have longed for the chance to transform a jaded Canberra home for profit, then this may be the one! Highly regarded as one of the best real estate tactics.....buying a home in need of some inspiration and vision is a smart choice for investors and home owners alike.
Sited on a huge 1137m2 block, with an impressive $302,000 UV, this spacious four bedroom home with study/formal dining and ensuite is the perfect reason to start an account at your local hardware store and an ideal shell to mould into something astonishing.
The original home is set to one side of the block, making it a great opportunity to develop an extension or dual occupancy (subject to approval) for maximum gain on your investment or even add outdoor features and entertainment options that will be the envy of the neighbourhood.
The current owners have used as a five bedroom home and as such it's already a potential money-spinner with an anticipated rental return of $500-$550 per week once it's been transformed.
If you're not afraid of rolling up your sleeves, or have a few good tradies in your contacts list, then this is the perfect chance to buy a large house on a huge block and create a dream home that would normally be out of your budget.
Be creative! Gather some friends together and challenge them to create the best design or share the whole project with like-minded investors who will pitch in for the experience as well as the potential gain.
Set in a loop street, it's a location that's bound to match whatever inspiration you can add to the property. There's a children's park just a few houses down and it's only a stroll from several local shops or Mount Rogers Reserve.
Features: Large block - 1137m2 Four bedrooms plus study/formal dining
Offered with vacant possession ready to renovate Kitchen and family room opening to backyard Generous living room with large windows Ensuite with shower, vanity and wc Main bathroom with bathtub & shower Spacious laundry Huge back yard with loads of potential Double garage and carport Large garden shed
Living Area: 145m2 approximate
Garage: 43m2 approximate
Carport: 37m2 approximate
PLEASE NOTE: PROPERTY SOLD AS IS, NO FURTHER WORK OR MAINTENANCE WILL BE CARRIED OUT ON PROPERTY, INCLUSIONS OR APPLIANCES.
